"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a0d0396368725922490e00#post_54a0d0396368725922490e00

All I know is she's not gonna break the console for the same reason you won't break her phone.

And if she does, there's no one to blame but her and she's well aware of it. The point is not breaking the stuff, is about balance, have the other part to feel the same pressure so that they can work a truce.

She's doing this for something, ask what it is and work with that.

topics.body:
Okay; so long explanation short:

My mom's boyfriend lost his last wife because she was a alcoholic and died due to drunk driving.
My mom has a tendency to emotionally clam up and drink.  She's one of those people that doesn't drink to enjoy it; rather she drinks to drown out whatever she's upset about.
This upset him because she was doing what killed his late wife.

*Long ass talk later*
She finally emotionally opened up.
Her challenge is to now if she is upset talk to whoever she feels most comfortable with.
His challenge is if he sees her drinking to try to get her to open up about what is upsetting her.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
